attributes.action: Get government to look at a pay and grading review they implemented  on councils
attributes.additional_details: If parliament doesn't debate this ,then it will be ovous to everyone why they wouldn't debate it or look at it .
attributes.background: Because the pay and grading reviews were used to defraud thousands of public sector workers out of wages

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what change or action you would like the Government to take in relation to local council job evaluation schemes. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
